You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r driving-plot, echo=FALSE}
dgr_driving <- crime %>% filter(`Offence Subgroup` == "A81 Dangerous driving") 


dgr_driving %>% 
  mutate(Year = as.factor(Year)) %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_col(aes(x = Year, y = `Incidents Recorded`))
```
